title: Wide-spectrum profiling of plasma cell-free RNA and the potential for health-monitoring.
description: This study characterized the plasma cfRNA landscape and identified potential health monitoring biomarkers using a novel wide-spectrum sequencing method.

title: Comprehensive evaluation of the impact of whole-genome bisulfite sequencing (WGBS) on the fragmentomic characteristics of plasma cell-free DNA.
journal: Clinica chimica acta; international journal of clinical chemistry
description: This paper systematically evaluated the impact of whole-genome bisulfite sequencing (WGBS) on cfDNA fragmentomic features compared to WGS, offering insights for liquid biopsy applications.

title: Evaluation of the impact of WGBS on cfDNA fragmentomic characteristics in pregnant women's plasma.
description: This study evaluated the impact of WGBS on cfDNA fragmentomic features in pregnant women's plasma, providing theoretical basis for non-invasive prenatal testing (NIPT).
